name: TagMango
headline: Monetisation tool for the Indian creator economy
description: TagMango is building a SAAS tool to enable edutainment creators create monetisation channels by creating paid and scalable communities. Anyone who has a skill-set, talent and an engaged audience can build their community on TagMango and provide exclusive services, learnings and content.

Launch Courses, Workshops, and Memberships, Engage Communities, and Gamify Learning - all under your Own Brand.

## **W hat creators do on TagMango**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044e97cd876a02f8636_Courses%20\(2\).webp)
### Courses
Offer interactive and engaging courses on various topics to a wide audience through our platform. Use assignments and forums to engage your learners.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044ccb56cc327f75b17_Workshops%20\(1\).webp)
### Workshops
Host Zoom webinars and meetings seamlessly integrated in the platform. Increase show up rate, mark attendance live and impart the best live learning experience.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044ae7fcc3c1e0a6b7c_Memberships%20\(1\).webp)
### Memberships
Create exclusive, recurring revenue streams by offering members-only access to your content, resources, and community.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044ccb56cc327f75b14_Communities%20\(2\).webp)
### Gamified Communities
Build a game, let learning be the by product. Allocate points on interaction and participation, give badges, track leaderboards and watch your engagement skyrocket.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f70441ec028aadca2f7f6_1_1%20Consultations%20\(1\).webp)
### 1:1 Consultations
Seamlessly host 1 to 1 consultations by easily creating, cancelling and rescheduling calls.
## **E xclusive features thathelp you sell more**
### Host workshops that upsell 20% more
Host live workshops, webinars, Q&As, and exclusive streams on TagMango's best-in-class video call tool for your audience. With our revolutionary live upsell feature, you can easily sell products during the call without the need for attendees to visit external links.
Unique upsell feature
Easy payment integration
Realtime sale notifications
Automated certificate issuance
Automatic email and whatsapp reminders
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0b08cd02093e0eb831_Frame%20237732%20\(8\).png)
### Launch courses that sell while you sleep
Our learning management system allows you to effortlessly create, manage and sell courses online. Our platform offers a range of features to enhance your learners' experience, including:
User-friendly course builder with drag-and-drop functionality
Fully customizable assignments and quizzes
Engaging discussion forums
Automated certificate issuance
Analytics to track learner progress
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0ba73ae90bc574dd49_Frame%20237732%20\(9\).png)
### Build social authority with branded android & iOS apps
Build your personalised android and iOS apps that go live with your name on the app store and playstore with aesthetics that resonate with your brand exclusively.
Establish a strong brand identity with a custom-branded Android and iOS app and website
Fully customizable app and website design to match your brand's unique style and aesthetic
Reach a wider audience by making your brand accessible on both Android and iOS platforms
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0ba73ae90bc574dda9_Frame%20237732%20\(10\).png)
### Reach faster and wider with email and whatsapp campaigns
Maximize your reach and personalize your interactions with your audience through the channels they prefer. Save time and increase conversions by setting up automated email and whatsapp marketing for your courses and workshops.
Fully customisable builders with drag-and-drop functionality
Set automations and workflows
Get a green tick on your whatsapp account
Leverage powerful analytics to track the performance of your campaigns
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0b4f13e0aeb9fa4d1a_Frame%20237732%20\(11\).png)
### Feed and Community Rooms
Create a vibrant community around your courses with social media like feed page and community rooms. Your audience will be able to engage with each other, ask questions, and share their experiences, fostering a sense of belonging and increasing student engagement.
Enable/disable P2P chats for controlled communication
Conduct challenges, giveaways, and more
Schedule posts to keep the community active
Fully controllable community rooms
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0c83b4a2327b71f2b8_Frame%20237732%20\(12\).png)
### Automate certificates for social proofing
Choose from a variety of certificate templates, fully customise with your colours, logo, and signature, and streamline and automate the process of issuing certificates. With just a few clicks, you'll be able to issue professional-looking certificates to your audience, recognizing their achievements and boosting their motivation.
One-click issuance of certificates at scale to a custom list
Automatically detect and send to workshop attendees only
Automatically send on course completion
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0b5be8d60923404da1_Frame%20237732%20\(13\).png)
### Landing pages that load fast and sell faster
Choose from multiple high-conversion templates for your landing page, along with no-code exit-intent popups.
#### **Beautifully designed templates**
Pre-existing templates that’ll help you make your own landing page within minutes.
#### Exit intent pop-ups
You can set up automated pop-ups to collect details of your visitors.
#### Countdown/Timer
If your offering is exclusive and for a limited time, people tend to be enticed by it more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0bf47cfb8164e5b440_Frame%20237732%20\(14\).png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363b8b5b6473107ad4367c_SID0782%201%20\(3\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)DiptiVartakCake artist and baker , **11+** years of experience, Conducted **100+** workshops for over **15,000** students](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363b8a4f13e0aeb9fb9280_image%2096.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)KamleshMoreTrained over**10,000** professionals and students to conquer their fear of English grammar without the hassle!](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363b8a8d34dcc489fed228_Copy%20of%20PHOTO-2023-02-11-00-40-40%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)PritamPatilFinancial coach who generated **10K+** customers and achieved **Rs. 60L** in earnings using TagMango in just 7 months](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363b8af68d5e7693a933f8_image%2095.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)RavitejJanagowdaCommunity has lost **1,500+** kgs and transformed **400+** members through the Body Shred Hub](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363b8b12582c4ba64cacce_videoframe_0%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)Dr SUNILJindalWith over **20** years of experience, they’ve helped more than **10,000** couples, achieving a few world records along the way](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)

## Why creators ❤️ TagMango
![Save Money and Time](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63f1cbb90314aa6b37309b24_Vector%20\(1\).svg)
### Save Money and Time
Say goodbye to the hassle of piecing together multiple tools for your courses and workshops. Our platform can help you reduce your expenses by up to 80%.
![Boost Your Conversions](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63f1cbb9f2b8ff7adf359019_Vector%20\(2\).svg)
### Boost Your Conversions
Our platform is designed to help you promote and sell your courses and workshops more effectively, leading to a 20% increase in conversions on average.
![Anti-Piracy Protection](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63f1cbb97a954c5fb690e516_Vector%20\(3\).svg)
### Anti-Piracy Protection
Our anti-piracy feature automatically takes down any instances of pirated content that appear online, ensuring that your content remains secure and protected.
![DRM Security](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63f1cbb9466e6242ef5962a8_Vector%20\(4\).svg)
### DRM Security
Our DRM security uses state-of-the-art technology to ensure that all your video content remains protected from unauthorized access or distribution.
![Dedicated Account Manager](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63f1cbe459fff8003db3f6ac_Vector%20\(6\).svg)
### Dedicated Account Manager
We provide a dedicated content strategist tailored to your needs, to support you every step of the way, from launching your courses to scaling your business.
![24/7 Support on TagMango](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63f1cbb959fff80ce8b3f44c_Vector%20\(5\).svg)
### 24/7 Support
Our support team is knowledgeable and experienced and is dedicated to ensuring that you have access to the help you need whenever you need it.
## Still not convinced?
Talk to our specialist and find out why creators love us so much.
[Book A Discovery Call](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)
How can I become a Creator of TagMango?
![TagMango FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63ea714634e8951d68fb7ef7_cross.svg)
It is easy-peasy. Simply sign up, add your details, and you can start hosting workshops and courses.
How can I monetise on TagMango?
![TagMango FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63ea714634e8951d68fb7ef7_cross.svg)
By building workshops and courses and monetising through your existing audiences.
What is the number of followers I need to have to become a Creator on TagMango?
![TagMango FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63ea714634e8951d68fb7ef7_cross.svg)
Your social media following doesn’t matter. You could have 100 or 1000 or 1 million followers. All you need is your skills and a community who wishes to learn from you.
If I am a Creator, can I subscribe to someone else’s courses and workshops?
![TagMango FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63ea714634e8951d68fb7ef7_cross.svg)
Absolutely! You can subscribe to a different creator on the platform. If you want to subscribe to someone, you just have to search for them and subscribe to one of their mangoes once their profile opens.
Why should I become a Creator on TagMango and not any other platform?
![TagMango FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63ea714634e8951d68fb7ef7_cross.svg)
Because we are the simplest platform to host workshops and courses on. Our suite of handy tools will simplify your monetisation journey. You can check out our Features page that will show you what all we offer.
## The Mango Insider (TMI)
The Mango Insider is TagMango’s weekly newsletter delivering actionable insights, trends, and updates on building & monetizing in the creator and coaching economy every Thursday.
[Subscribe To TMI](https://www.tagmango.com/<https:/themangonetwork.substack.com/>)

## **W hat creators do on TagMango**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044e97cd876a02f8636_Courses%20\(2\).webp)
### Courses
Offer interactive and engaging courses on various topics to a wide audience through our platform. Use assignments and forums to engage your learners.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044ccb56cc327f75b17_Workshops%20\(1\).webp)
### Workshops
Host Zoom webinars and meetings seamlessly integrated in the platform. Increase show up rate, mark attendance live and impart the best live learning experience.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044ae7fcc3c1e0a6b7c_Memberships%20\(1\).webp)
### Memberships
Create exclusive, recurring revenue streams by offering members-only access to your content, resources, and community.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f7044ccb56cc327f75b14_Communities%20\(2\).webp)
### Gamified Communities
Build a game, let learning be the by product. Allocate points on interaction and participation, give badges, track leaderboards and watch your engagement skyrocket.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/677f70441ec028aadca2f7f6_1_1%20Consultations%20\(1\).webp)
### 1:1 Consultations
Seamlessly host 1 to 1 consultations by easily creating, cancelling and rescheduling calls.
## **E xclusive features thathelp you sell more**
### Host workshops that upsell 20% more
Host live workshops, webinars, Q&As, and exclusive streams on TagMango's best-in-class video call tool for your audience. With our revolutionary live upsell feature, you can easily sell products during the call without the need for attendees to visit external links.
Unique upsell feature
Easy payment integration
Realtime sale notifications
Automated certificate issuance
Automatic email and whatsapp reminders
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0b08cd02093e0eb831_Frame%20237732%20\(8\).png)
### Launch courses that sell while you sleep
Our learning management system allows you to effortlessly create, manage and sell courses online. Our platform offers a range of features to enhance your learners' experience, including:
User-friendly course builder with drag-and-drop functionality
Fully customizable assignments and quizzes
Engaging discussion forums
Automated certificate issuance
Analytics to track learner progress
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0ba73ae90bc574dd49_Frame%20237732%20\(9\).png)
### Build social authority with branded android & iOS apps
Build your personalised android and iOS apps that go live with your name on the app store and playstore with aesthetics that resonate with your brand exclusively.
Establish a strong brand identity with a custom-branded Android and iOS app and website
Fully customizable app and website design to match your brand's unique style and aesthetic
Reach a wider audience by making your brand accessible on both Android and iOS platforms
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0ba73ae90bc574dda9_Frame%20237732%20\(10\).png)
### Reach faster and wider with email and whatsapp campaigns
Maximize your reach and personalize your interactions with your audience through the channels they prefer. Save time and increase conversions by setting up automated email and whatsapp marketing for your courses and workshops.
Fully customisable builders with drag-and-drop functionality
Set automations and workflows
Get a green tick on your whatsapp account
Leverage powerful analytics to track the performance of your campaigns
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0b4f13e0aeb9fa4d1a_Frame%20237732%20\(11\).png)
### Feed and Community Rooms
Create a vibrant community around your courses with social media like feed page and community rooms. Your audience will be able to engage with each other, ask questions, and share their experiences, fostering a sense of belonging and increasing student engagement.
Enable/disable P2P chats for controlled communication
Conduct challenges, giveaways, and more
Schedule posts to keep the community active
Fully controllable community rooms
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0c83b4a2327b71f2b8_Frame%20237732%20\(12\).png)
### Automate certificates for social proofing
Choose from a variety of certificate templates, fully customise with your colours, logo, and signature, and streamline and automate the process of issuing certificates. With just a few clicks, you'll be able to issue professional-looking certificates to your audience, recognizing their achievements and boosting their motivation.
One-click issuance of certificates at scale to a custom list
Automatically detect and send to workshop attendees only
Automatically send on course completion
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0b5be8d60923404da1_Frame%20237732%20\(13\).png)
### Landing pages that load fast and sell faster
Choose from multiple high-conversion templates for your landing page, along with no-code exit-intent popups.
#### **Beautifully designed templates**
Pre-existing templates that’ll help you make your own landing page within minutes.
#### Exit intent pop-ups
You can set up automated pop-ups to collect details of your visitors.
#### Countdown/Timer
If your offering is exclusive and for a limited time, people tend to be enticed by it more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363a0bf47cfb8164e5b440_Frame%20237732%20\(14\).png)
![⟨11⟩.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)DiptiVartakCake artist and baker , **11+** years of experience, Conducted **100+** workshops for over **15,000** students](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)![⟨12⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)KamleshMoreTrained over**10,000** professionals and students to conquer their fear of English grammar without the hassle!](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)![⟨13⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)PritamPatilFinancial coach who generated **10K+** customers and achieved **Rs. 60L** in earnings using TagMango in just 7 months](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)![⟨14⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)RavitejJanagowdaCommunity has lost **1,500+** kgs and transformed **400+** members through the Body Shred Hub](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)![⟨15⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/67363d162df203179a4f01ab_Buttons%20\(3\).svg)Dr SUNILJindalWith over **20** years of experience, they’ve helped more than **10,000** couples, achieving a few world records along the way](https://www.tagmango.com/<#>)
## You can start selling within 60 seconds.
Join more than 5000 creators who’ve sold over $5 million in courses and workshops business.
![Quote Icon⟨16⟩]
My onboarding experience on TagMango was quite smooth, took less than a minute!
- Shashwat Amrev, Stock Market Edges
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63e9e777ca756dd1bcd0e4d1/63ff0711b8692c7ec2e1d928_Shashwat%20Verma%20-%20Testi%20\(1\).png)
Get Started for FREE Now!⟨5⟩
![Footer Arrow Pattern⟨17⟩]
## Why creators ❤️ TagMango
![Save Money and Time⟨18⟩].svg)
### Save Money and Time
Say goodbye to the hassle of piecing together multiple tools for your courses and workshops. Our platform can help you reduce your expenses by up to 80%.
![Boost Your Conversions⟨19⟩].svg)
### Boost Your Conversions
Our platform is designed to help you promote and sell your courses and workshops more effectively, leading to a 20% increase in conversions on average.
![Anti-Piracy Protection⟨20⟩].svg)
### Anti-Piracy Protection
Our anti-piracy feature automatically takes down any instances of pirated content that appear online, ensuring that your content remains secure and protected.
![DRM Security⟨21⟩].svg)
### DRM Security
Our DRM security uses state-of-the-art technology to ensure that all your video content remains protected from unauthorized access or distribution.
![Dedicated Account Manager⟨22⟩].svg)
### Dedicated Account Manager
We provide a dedicated content strategist tailored to your needs, to support you every step of the way, from launching your courses to scaling your business.
![24/7 Support on TagMango⟨23⟩].svg)
### 24/7 Support
Our support team is knowledgeable and experienced and is dedicated to ensuring that you have access to the help you need whenever you need it.
## Still not convinced?
Talk to our specialist and find out why creators love us so much.
Book A Discovery Call⟨10⟩
How can I become a Creator of TagMango?
![TagMango FAQ icon⟨24⟩]
It is easy-peasy. Simply sign up, add your details, and you can start hosting workshops and courses.
How can I monetise on TagMango?
![TagMango FAQ icon⟨24⟩]
By building workshops and courses and monetising through your existing audiences.
What is the number of followers I need to have to become a Creator on TagMango?
![TagMango FAQ icon⟨24⟩]
Your social media following doesn’t matter. You could have 100 or 1000 or 1 million followers. All you need is your skills and a community who wishes to learn from you.
If I am a Creator, can I subscribe to someone else’s courses and workshops?
![TagMango FAQ icon⟨24⟩]
Absolutely! You can subscribe to a different creator on the platform. If you want to subscribe to someone, you just have to search for them and subscribe to one of their mangoes once their profile opens.
Why should I become a Creator on TagMango and not any other platform?
![TagMango FAQ icon⟨24⟩]
Because we are the simplest platform to host workshops and courses on. Our suite of handy tools will simplify your monetisation journey. You can check out our Features page that will show you what all we offer.
## The Mango Insider (TMI)
The Mango Insider is TagMango’s weekly newsletter delivering actionable insights, trends, and updates on building & monetizing in the creator and coaching economy every Thursday.
Subscribe To TMI⟨25⟩

generated_description:
TagMango, founded in 2019 and based in Kolkata, India, is a game-changer in the Indian creator economy. As part of Y Combinator's Batch W20, their mission is clear: they aim to provide a monetization tool for creators looking to harness their skills and talents into sustainable income streams.

If you’re an edutainment creator, TagMango offers a robust SaaS platform that allows you to create paid and scalable communities. Think of it as a facilitator for anyone with knowledge and a dedicated audience to build exclusive spaces for delivering unique content, courses, workshops, and memberships. They’ve built a vibrant ecosystem where over 3,000 creators have been able to generate more than ₹300 Crores in annual earnings collectively.

Their platform is packed with features aimed at helping you sell your knowledge efficiently. You can host interactive courses, engage communities with gamified learning experiences, conduct workshops, and offer one-on-one consultations. Plus, they provide the tools necessary for automating marketing, issuing certificates, and even launching custom-branded mobile applications for creators. All of this contributes to a more seamless experience for both creators and their audience.

As of now, TagMango comprises a 16-person team dedicated to supporting its creators, making monetization simpler and more efficient. Whether you have 100 or a million followers, if you have a talent or a skill, you can start monetizing in less than a minute. They also cater to creators from various niches, allowing them to foster a sense of community and learning among their audiences.

If you're looking to jump into the creator economy, TagMango might just be the platform that pushes you to the next level. You can register for free, and who knows? You might find yourself joining the ranks of creators who have successfully turned their passion into profit. For more information, visit their website at [tagmango.com](https://www.tagmango.com).
